articles.description: Tata Semiconductor Assembly and Test Pvt Ltd  will set up a semiconductor unit in Assam. With a capacity of producing 48 million chips per day, this facility is being built for Rs 27,000 crore
articles.content: Industrialist and philanthropist Ratan Tata said that Tata's manufacturing of semiconductors in Assam will put the state on the global map. Assam CM Sarma called on Tata Sons Emeritus Chairman Ratan … [+2630 chars]
